content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to walk my dog.  i looked up and stopped in my tracks.  there was a large black object, that did not reflect any light to the north of my location.  it appeared to almost absorb light,because there was 0 reflection.  it appeared triangular in shape with 3 white lights on each corner.  there was 1 red blinking light that flashed with a constant frequency that appeared to be in the middle of the bottom of the craft.  it was not flat, which could make the object appear different to viewers at different angles.  after passing in front is looked triangular.  when passing in front it looked rectangular.  it was way larger than any other craft i have ever seen and totally silent.  it left no trail.  i can't even begin to describe how large this craft really was, just enormous.  i called to my wife to make sure she saw it too.  she too looked at it and said it is huge and what is that?  

it traveled in a straight line without veering.  headed almost true west from my location in a straight line.  as it headed out of sight you could see the red blinking light underneath, and two of the white lights on the back of the aircraft. we lost sight after it continued in the straight line of path behind a large group of trees. 

when i saw the object and afterward, i still have no clue what it is.  it moved slower than any aircraft, but much faster than any blimp.  i tried to capture a picture on my phone, but it did not capture anything present.  even the white lights did not show up.
content.summary: Black rectangle/triangle shaped object over pittsburgh

content.detailedDescription: Hi i want to share this photo with my ipod 6th generation on 1-7-16 at 12:25 pm both photos were taken at the same moment. photo 1 no object, photo 2 small object appears in as fast as a i snapped the second photo both with the time stamp of 12:25 pm, third photo i tried to enlarge it......Your thoughts?
content.summary: Not seen with naked eye shows up on photo

content.detailedDescription: My son. three months ago lockport ny witnessed a ufo we have a main road heave lie traveled called transit road straight road going north east and going south west my son had my grandson with him in a truck vision very good out of no where still in lockport ny on transit my grandson said to hid look at the sky my son right away pulled over and they saw a ufo very large right over them this object did not move for a while then began to rotate the craft was matalic and domed shaptedl my son said i quote not from this earth and my son is an enegerere this. craft made no noise as my son had pulled over a policeman pulled over also. and he to saw the same thing and asked my son was pulled over on transit the. officer looked up said nothing and pulled away my son then in a matter of minutes craft still being there my son and grandson say a jet fighter approach the object quote the jet fired at the object my son and grandson both saw flames shoot out of the jet firing at the ufo at that moment the craft seem to disappear  they came telling the story and have never altered what they had seen  also we have a newspaper. called the union sun and journal nothing was ever reported this does seem very strange when their were other people seeing the same thing i did say it happened about three mo ago but it was just the beginning of fall my family really do believe there are others out. there besides us  thank you for listening i fog also a hellacopter appeared along with the jet
content.summary: Saw son ad grandson saw ufo

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of the moon from my mom's house at 7:30 in the morning.  i did not see the white disc when i took the picture. i noticed it later while viewing my pictures.
content.summary: White disc in picture of moon

content.detailedDescription:
I'm in the aviation field and i spend most of my time outside on night shift. please note that i do not want to be contacted nor can i give anymore details about myself or what i witnessed due to security reasons. thank you for understanding.

last night, 07jan16, between the time of 19:40-20:00, i witnessed something that i can not explain. during my usual shift, i have a lot of down time between flight schedule where i like to relax and look for shooting stars. we have a really good view of the stars because of the lack of light pollution in this particular area. it was on this precise occasion when i had my sighting. as i was watching the skies which i do periodically every single night during my shift, i observed a giant black silent object of some sort that seemed to be gliding. the object was heading north to south at a steady speed. it took approximately 10 seconds from the time i noticed it directly above me until the time it disappeared over some buildings i was standing close to. the runway was not being used at this moment so there was no noise coming from any equipment, airplanes, and absolutely no noise from the object. the usual (and only) type of aircraft we have at this location are extremely loud, even at cruising speed. another bizarre thing to note was this object had no identifying lights. that would be a disastrous idea to fly in this particular airspace with no lights and would mean instant response measures and highly against the law.

after my sighting, i was dumbfounded. i told another coworker about what i saw with excitement and since we still had lots of time to spare before we had to get back to work, we watched the skies together for this mysterious object. sure enough, about 15 minutes later it reappeared in almost the exact same flight path as before, but this time it was moving slower and at an arc going north to southwest. i sighted it first and pointed my coworking in the direction and this person saw it as well. this sighting took approxomimately 30 seconds. it was not witnessed again. we have no idea what it was because it appeared to not have any engines due to its silence nor any positioning lights. i would estimate that it was between 150-200 feet wide, gliding at an altitude between 500-1000 feet. the night was clear at this particular time with a full view of the stars. the reason i noticed it at all was because it faintly reflected light from our location off of its belly, it was a slightly different shade of black than the sky behind it and it blocked out the stars as it glided. i wish i could give more reasons as to how i know it wasn't from where i work but i can't. all i can say is it's not from this location nor was there any indications that anyone else knew it was flying over. we did not report our sighting to anyone in charge for fear of ridicule.
content.summary: Silent black boomerang shaped aircraft sighted

content.detailedDescription:
Relaxing floating in the backyard pool on a hot afternoon we witnessed a white object stationary high up in the atmosphere. it appeared to fade in. half the size of a small fingernail.  positioned roughly over tea tree gully area.
the object remained in the same position for over 10 minutes, during this time, i rushed inside to get the video camera upon finding the battery was flat, so i rushed back inside to get the camera.  my guests said the object seem to ascend and disappeared after 14 minutes.   later it returned in the same position in the sky, i ran inside again to get the camera i just put back and it ascended and disappeared.   the object looked as if it was pulsating slowly.  amazingly it remained in the same position without any movement.   it looked as if it was higher than a normal 737-800 on route to sydney travelling over adelaide west to east.

thought mufon could be interested in this sighting for information in hindsight.
content.summary: White glowing starlike object

content.detailedDescription:
I was six years old in june of 1977 and in the company of my mother, then a master's student at the university of texas el paso, my soon-to-be step father, a professor of political science at the same institution and a family friend, an officer of the united states border patrol. we had spent the day driving and hiking along the us border with mexico near presidio tx and had settled down to camp after dusk in an open stretch of desert. our camp consisted of a small campfire, sleeping bags and surplus us army folding cots. there was no other shelter as we planned to sleep under the stars after a light dinner cooked on the fire. the valley floor was bathed in near complete darkness as there was either no moon that night or it had not yet risen. well after our meal and as the conversation wound down someone in our party noticed an array of red and white lights moving to the west of us in a southerly direction toward mexico. the lights appeared to be flying very low, well below the crest of some distant mountains now clearly silhouetted against the dissipating western sunset and the encroaching stars. the general consensus amongst the adults was that it might be small plane, possibly narco-traffic avoiding radar on a return trip to the south. at the scale of a cessna, the craft would have likely been 3 miles distant and moving at an equivalent rate of speed.  the craft appeared to maintain a straight line of direction but within a minute or so had moved almost directly due south, relative to our position, and likely already into mexico. this indicated it had either assumed a wide arc around us in its flight from the west or had been moving to the se in a straight line. reaching the southerly position the craft seemed to slow to a stop, appearing to hover still some 2 miles distant. the consensus was that it had likely initiated a turn south and was now heading directly away from us and thus deeper into mexico. momentarily forgotten it was only a few seconds later that someone noticed that the craft was getting bigger and instead appeared to be heading directly towards us. the border patrol officer indicated he now believed the craft was likely a border patrol helicopter, possibly coming to 'check us out', drawn by the glow of our campfire. from that moment on everyone was utterly silent, straining to make sense of what was coming directly at us in the dark. at six years old, i was elated at the prospect of seeing a helicopter up close, as i'd only ever seen them on tv and perhaps once grounded on the tarmac at a public air display at the ft. bliss military base, a few miles distant from our home in el paso. the craft, appearing to be only a few dozen feet in altitude grew larger as it drew closer, its red and white lights bright and arrayed in a manner unlike anything i'd seen before.  approaching without a sound or causing any other noticeable disturbance, the craft slowed, coming to a gentle stop no more than 40 feet directly overhead.  the craft appeared, from both our vantage as it had approached and then underneath it, to be circular, disc-like, some twenty feet in diameter and completely opaque to the stars around it. given that it was absolutely devoid of any color its true shape was difficult to discern save for the lights which glowed intensely at the edges of its perimeter without reflecting against, or illuminating, any portion of its surface. at this point my remaining observations are somewhat fractured, perhaps the result of adrenaline, the erosion of the memory over time or possibly some other influence.  i recall that there was absolutely no sound; no hum, no buzz, nothing of a mechanical or electrical nature. there was also no wind or downdraft as you would expect from a helicopter or any other manmade craft hovering in the air overhead. being camped on the desert floor, any disturbance of the surrounding dust and sand would have immediately filled the air, our eyes and begun choking us, which did not happen. at some point i recall looking to my mother and feeling fear turn to terror as i watched her looking upward in stunned silence, her eyes wide open and mouth agape but now bathed in a skin-bleaching bright blue-white light. i tried to get her attention. "mom!" but, reminiscent of some quasi-dreamlike state, i couldn't hear my own voice, and i don't believe she could hear me either. it may be, on recollection, that the apparent silence may have not been an absence of sound but a state induced by the craft itself. that unheard utterance is the last memory i have before waking the next morning in my cot to find we had inadvertently camped only a few hundred feet away from cemetery. there was an early-morning funeral taking place and it naturally felt awkward and intrusive for us to be camped so close by, thus we hurriedly ate a makeshift breakfast and left as quietly as we could. to be clear, the craft from the previous night had not been seen to leave, the memory of the encounter just seems to have ended with it there, hanging silently overhead, bristling with lights and blocking out the stars. there was no subsequent discussion of the events, nobody spoke of it on the drive home nor thereafter to my recollection and, for the better part of two decades, it was all but forgotten. 

the incident had nagged at me for years.  i had rationalized the craft as being the suggested border patrol helicopter but always, at the edges of my memory, i wondered at the lack of sound or wind, especially as i grew older and more thoroughly understood how helicopters and other airborne craft operate. in 1997 my parents and younger siblings returned from an extended period living overseas and had moved to a nearby state. on a visit i thought to bring up the incident after a dinner. not intending to voice any suspicions, but rather to affirm my lifelong supposition, i asked my parents about camping that night and eventually worked the conversation over to the presence of a helicopter. my mother remembered the trip in good detail but had no recollection of seeing a helicopter or any other craft. my stepfather, however, started to become excited as the conversation developed, and when i finally asked about the presence of the helicopter he could no longer restrain himself."that was no helicopter, that was a ufo!". suddenly all of the little lies i'd been telling myself to support a rational interpretation of the event came crashing down. 

i had considered making a mufon report years ago, but lacked any real evidence other than anecdote and, coupled with the fact that i wasn't even sure exactly when the event had occurred, i decided to leave it alone believing that the my anecdotes surrounding the incident could in no way contribute to our understanding of the ufo phenomenon. two years ago i received a digitized copy of our family photo albums from my mother. i'd just had a child and i guess she felt it was time to pass down the legacy of our recent lineage. in the mix of hundreds of other photos were a handful from the day of that fateful trip, each photo printed with the month and year it was taken. sadly, while it appears a camera was in my mother's possession, i don't think it occurred to her at the time to take a photo of the craft. given that there is at least some data to now cross-reference with other cases, i submit this to you in the hope that, as the age of bulk-data analysis matures it may somehow, at some future time, contribute to our understanding of what was and is taking place in our skies.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Distant travelling lights changed course and came to hover directly over remote desert campsite

content.detailedDescription: This has been on the in rise. alot of witnesses. these orange craft have made an impact on our communnity. forever
content.summary: We have beeb spotting these craft all summer with credible witneessses

content.detailedDescription: I'm a truck driver heading north on route a9, i travel this route at least twice every week and know the road very well.  passed turning on right for moy (b9154) and approximately 1.5 miles further on the trees on the right side stop and the plain beyond is visible (flattish moorland bisected by railway line rising slightly toward the horizon) the road at this point is fairly straight, 2 lane single carriageway.  bright lights caught my eye to my right (as i said i travel this road a lot and have never seen these lights before) and i saw a bluish, green 'bar' light at the base and this was topped with a red bar of the same width but about twice as thick as the blue/green light. steady, very bright lights, both colours the same intensity not moving, stationary and i would estimate about 3 fingers above the horizon. i have an extensive knowledge of aircraft both military and civilian and this was not like any aircraft i have seen in the past, my immediate thought was ufo. as far as feelings, i was calm and focused but due to traffic i was unable to stop to attempt taking photos and couldn't hear any sound from the object.   hill on the right obstructed my view as i drove north. there were quite a few other vehicles on the road both going north and south at the time.
content.summary: Driving past saw lights to my right, unable to stop

content.detailedDescription:
Possible orb january 5, 2016
i was ice fishing at ackley reservoir near hobson, mt with my wife. we stayed overnight in the back of the pickup, jan 4. i woke up at midnight, got out to relieve myself and let the dog out of the cab. it was a clear night and i gazed at the stars for a few minutes, then put the dog in and went back to bed. i woke up again at 0400 and got out to check on the dog and start a generator for a little heat. generator did not start. during this time i noticed a roundish object far in the distance towards the south/southeast (est 150-160 deg azimuth). the object was about the size of the moon, nearly round but with blurred edges, and a yellowish/orangeish color. it was low in the sky, roughly 5 degrees. there was a thin and scattered cloud cover as you could still see some stars. at the time, i felt it was odd – the colors and the direction of this object. i was cold and wanted to get back to my warm sleeping bag. i decided it was a waning moon rising, even though the direction was off. i got up a little before dawn at 0715. as i walked to the restroom and back i saw another round object in the sky, similar to the one at 0400 in size and direction, except that this one was white, more round with a slightly more distinct edge and much higher in the sky (est 30-40 deg).  the cloud cover had increased since 0400 and it was definitely getting light as i could see where the sun was going to rise. i said yeah it’s the moon and mostly forgot about it till a few days later. i got to thinking about what phase the moon was in and realized the full moon was 11 days past. 
i know my directions at this location even in the dark. i have been coming here off/on for about 20 years, both when i lived to the north in great falls and later in the south at roundup. most of the time it’s been for ice fishing. as usual, we were parked on the northwest side of the reservoir, which lies north/nw of and between two mountain ranges. i was looking across the reservoir and between the two ranges. that means i was looking south/se. i saw where the sun was going to rise – just north of the big snowies and this was 30-40 degrees east of the 0400 object. pre-sunrise azimuth was 107deg at 0730. i checked on the moon phase and position for 1/5/16. the moon was waning (bright on left) with 20-21% relative brightness. at 0400 the moon was at 3 deg altitude and 126 deg azimuth. at 0715 the moon was at 25 deg altitude and 167 deg azimuth. 
the altitude of the objects are similar to the moons altitude at 0400 and 0715 and so is the azimuth for the 0715 object. however, the azimuth for the 0400 object is greater than 30 degs south of the moon. there are only a couple very small towns in that direction. it was not the glow of city lights, although a spot light could possibly have made that image. i don’t recall ever seeing a spotlight shining in the sky anywhere in predawn hours.  
the other thing that struck me is the fact that the moon on 1/5 was only a thin waning (bright on left side) crescent with 20-21% relative brightness. the objects i saw were more like a 80-90% waxing (bright on right side) moon, much brighter and more distinctively round. i never saw a waning crescent moon the morning of 1/5. at 0400 the moons azimuth would have placed it behind the big snowy mtns, so i would not have seen it. at 0715, i feel the cloud cover and predawn light in the sky would have overcome a thin crescent moon. one last thing that seems to eliminate my mistaking the moon for another object- the direction the object traveled between the two times i saw it. i looked in the same direction each time i saw it- towards the south/se. if it were the moon it would have passed directly overhead on its path (heading to the northwest), but we all know the moon moves from east to west, or southeast to southwest.  according to the moon calculator, the moon on 1/5 would have reached its peak altitude of only 28 deg at 0830- only 3 deg higher and only 1 hour and 15 minutes after i last saw it at 0715.  even a full moon this time of year only reaches a maximum altitude of 61 degrees, but this object, had it continued on its path would have reached nearly 90 degrees. even if the objects i saw where not the same object, the fact that they were more full circle than crescent makes me believe they were not the moon. 
i did not focus long enough on either object to see it move. i just assumed it was the moon, although “things” did not make complete sense. i sure wish i would have looked at these objects much longer to determine what they were. i also could have taken some photos if i had brought my camera.
one last point to consider. this area of montana has nuclear missile silos, a lot of them. from west of great falls, to north and east of lewistown and south to harlowton, there are 200 silos and 20 launch control facilities. we drive by many of these sites on the way to ackley reservoir. according to wikipedia, most or all nuclear missiles have been retired from these silos, but i am still researching the status of these facilities. one of the witness testimonials on the sirius disclosure site is retired air force officer robert salas. he was a commander at the oscar flight launch control facility (malmstrom afb) in 1967 where he describes an event with a ufo that caused 8 missiles to become inactive, simultaneously. this scenario also occurred at an adjacent facility (echo flight) at the same time.     m.N. 1/8/16
content.summary: Possible orbs that look like a nearly full moon when the moon was only 20% waning at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
Lost my paper work in moving. it is now 2016. this was in the fall of 1957. clear sunny day.
it was in the afternoon in my back yard.  we had no fence and i was hooking long leash for dog on long cloths line.  thought i heard a plane a long way away . i looked up and there was this round disc just hovering there.  i wanted to scream but could not get a sound out.  it was silver gray and just turned so quick and turned white and was gone in a flash.

i called my husband who worked at a newspaper and asked if they had any reports and he told me to call the police.  i did not because any reports at that time were considered nuts.  

i wish now i had civil defense and i am now 86 and have been wondering about this for all these years.

i was shaking and crying.  i wish i could have seen it longer.

thank you,

darlene petersen
content.summary: Looked up and there it was

content.detailedDescription: I was 8 yrs old at the time. my older brother, little sister and mom all saw the same thing. around 9pm, it was dark, we were driving in our car and went to make a turn around at the end of the street, like we do often. however this night as i looked out the window, right above the tree tops there was a large dark object hovering over a tree and house. i said to my mom what is that? she said "you see it too" then my siblings agreed they saw it too. my mom pulled underneath the tree, there was a spot light/beam shining down, moving around, as if it was looking for something.It made no sound. after a few minutes my mom started driving back up the road. at this point the light went away and it started following us up the street. it was behind a row of houses but we could see it in the gaps, slowing following us up the street. we made a turn behind a church and by the time we came around the other side it had disappeared. during the experience we all felt a sense of curiosity and calmness.
content.summary: Follwed by unknown object

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and looked up trying to find the big dipper then i seen the largest aircraft i have ever seen and it had no wings and no blades like helicopter and it made no noise at all and did not leave a trail. the headlights were white with red tail lights and it looked modern. i was not the only person who seen it i was accompanied by two others none of us had any alcohol and none of us were on prescription medication. i initially thought it was a secret military aircraft but upon hearing no sound and realizing it didnt have wings and we dont have any aircraft that large i realized this has to be other wordly. it was rectangular in shape and had a rounded front end. the object flew a slow straight line heading west.
content.summary: Extremely large rectangle no noise no wings no blades 6 total lights looked modern

content.detailedDescription:
on 1-5-16 subject spotted flickering blue object out of the east from inside his house window. it appeared to have 3 lights, sometimes a blob,sometimes a triangle always flickering. when in a triangle,the 3 lights were right up against each other and not spread out.The lights were configured as to 2 on the top and 1 on the bottom. event occurred about 8:25pm and re-occured same time and place on 1-6-16 and 1-7-16.

report by field investigator brian harper at mufon hq in newport beach,ca
content.summary: Subject spotted flickering blue object with 3 lights, sometimes a blob,sometimes a triangle always flickering

content.detailedDescription: I was out camping and one of my friends came to pick me up to hangout since they live close to the campground. on the way back once we were back on the campground he told me to look at the horizon. there were two pink orbs floating right above the trees, across the bay. i watched them move farther apart, come together, and then disappear once i got out of the car. a first i thought it may have been a flare, being on the water it isn't implausible for someone to be in distress. afterwards i felt really afraid. i don't know if it is related, but today 01/08/16 there was a big boom across the whole county and no one can figure out what it was.
content.summary: I watched two pink orbs hover, then come together, then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was home it started moving up n down then i used my tool started doing morris code wit it it moves all over the place follows my tool it has never tryed to hurt me so i do not want nothing 2 happen 2 it no gov because its had chances 2 hurt me but don't its looks kinda like a star but it is really bright n it flashes lights back at me no i am not scared of it either like i said its friendly i do wish it would land i would hide the craft i want 2 meet them i do this every night i love going outside with my tool n communicating wit it when a plane gets n sight we both freeze it dems out its like my friend back forth all round we play
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was awsome i have been cummunicating wit them for 5 years its friendly plays with me

content.detailedDescription: I have been communicating with them 4 5 years now they never try 2 hurt me when a plane comes we both stop its so awsome n cool it gets really low but won't land but i hope 1 day it does so plz dont hurt it its friendly n we use morris code it goes up down all round playing wit me after a while it jus goes up n away unless i use my tool 2 send codes so i kno it won't hurt me it uses all lights 2 call back 2 me it goes n same direction as my tool no i am not afrade 2 many chances 4 them 2 hurt me n didn't i think it's awsome n i want 2 meet them
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It's friendly it's white n orange red yellow looking.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dusk, very close to dark, at sequoyah state park. i had just finished hiking with my 3 dogs and was loading them into a van. i glanced up and saw a very bright round white light moving approximately northwest. i had initially been facing north loading the dogs in side of van and had turned to right (east) and noticed the object up above and to my right going over the fort gibson lake eastern area about where wildwood or hulbert landing is.

i hurriedly loaded the dogs in the van. i immediately knew this was the same type of unknown object i had seen on october 9, 2013, a few weeks before and at a location nearby and across the lake to the west. it was also moving at approximately the same speed and the same altitude as the previously observed object.

this time, there was a small private airplane, which i could hear and see, including the blinking lights, to my north within a mile or so.  i estimated this airplane at 500 feet altitude. the very bright round white light continued northwest and to the south of the airplane and passed between the airplane and me. the object was approximately 75% the size of the airplane, which was approximately the size of a single engine cessna. the airplane was proceeding approximately eastbound and undoubtedly the pilot saw this object just to the south within hundreds of feet.

i reached into my van to retrieve my binoculars in my backpack i had used for birding that day. when i looked back up from van the object had vanished, perhaps blinked out or accelerated and disappeared. there had not been enough time for the object, at the current rate of speed, to have disappeared over the horizon or a tree line. this gave me an eery feeling, especially since i had seen this exact same type of object so recently at a nearby location.

however, i was able to confirm the approximate size and altitude of the october 9, 2013 sighting that i had previously been only to have estimated. i filed a sighting report for that event, which had more detail about the object.
content.summary: Very bright round white light steadily moving at 500 feet

content.detailedDescription:
100913 very bright round light steadily moving at 500 feet

i was in my front yard in a rural area at night using google sky map app with a google nexus 7 tablet observing and identifying stars, planets, galaxies, etc. i was also using the flight aware app to see which, if any, aircraft were in the vicinity. facing north, i noticed a very bright light to my left (west) on the horizon above tree line coming towards me. i dismissed at first and thought, "i'll go to porch (nearby) to retrieve 50 power binoculars in a minute after i look at something else, then look at that plane".

i hurriedly looked at some other things with google sky map, saw the very bright object to the left was steadily proceeding eastbound, and grabbed binoculars from porch. i was thinking i would begin to hear a sound, such as a gas or jet engine from object, but it was quiet except for very light approximately northerly breeze through some nearby trees.

i went back out into yard to approximately the same location and looked again at object which was much closer now and approximately to the northwest of me. still no sound or flashing lights expected from an aircraft. all i could see was a bright round white light steadily going approximately eastward. it was the brightest object in the sky. my first thought then was it was a balloon of some sort.

i looked at the object with my binoculars and all i saw was a closer image of a bright round white light. the light appeared to be emitting evenly as in no change in luminescence anywhere on object. i thought i might be able to see a structure of the object from reflection of the light on the object as i have seen on airplanes flying over at night (e.G. a portion of the wings or fuselage).

though frustrated because there was no true basis or frame of reference to estimate altitude or size because it was just a bright round white light, i estimated the object was 500 feet in altitude and about the size of a single engine aircraft such as a cessna. i would later be able to confirm this estimate with a second sighting nearby on december 16, 2013 which was about two months later and about 5 miles away. i will file a report on the second sighting after this one.

still watching the object proceeding eastbound, the steadiness of the speed led me to doubt it was a balloon plus there was hardly any wind at ground level. it was a calm night. while i was still wondering if it was a balloon of some sort or even a drone, the object made a very clean, arcing turn to the north without changing speed. still no sound, change in shape, flashing lights, or any other visual clues could be seen. this ruled out a balloon as it turned into the very light approximately northerly breeze.

the object was now proceeding away from me northbound until it disappeared over a tree line. i looked at the object several times with both the binoculars (50 power) and my eyes. there was never any change in speed or appearance, always a very bright round white light moving at a steady, brisk speed even during the one 90 degree turn i observed. i have no idea what it was and had never observed such an object in my years of observation. 

i have experience observing the skies from years of 1) observing and identifying planets, stars, constellations, galaxies, etc., 2) the habit of looking up at sky during daytime to observe and identify birds, 3) visually identifying and tracking planes both daytime and nighttime with a flight app, and 4) flying in small aircraft in earlier years and knowing the altitude. i also have observed "chinese" lanterns floating overhead at the same location during 4th of july, which were quite easy to identify with a scope or 50 power binoculars.
content.summary: Very bright round light steadily moving at 500 feet

content.detailedDescription: Hi only noticed when looking at old photos the photo is of my dad and my sister and myself it would have been taken in about 1960 as i look about 4 or 5 years old
content.summary: Only noticed when looking at old photos

content.detailedDescription: When driving to work just west of edwardsburg, mi on m12 near the intersection of conrad around 5am (give or take a few minutes), my girlfriend observed a downward arcing object as brilliant as a flare the size of a basketball appearing in the sky several hundred feet in the air just to the north of her then changing course straight downward and disappeared into a farmer's field.  the event happened very quickly as the object was traveling at incredible speed.  this occurred on tuesday morning and that evening she told me about what she had witnessed.  wednesday after i was off work, i asked her to show me the exact location she last saw the object - we had received a decent amount of snow on monday (1/4/2016) and i was hoping there might be visible signs in the snow where she last saw this object disappear in the field since no further rain or snow had fallen yet.  the vanishing/crash/landing site of this was not the location i was expecting from her verbal directions in our previous conversations. even though she was west of conrad on m12 driving eastbound when she saw it, the objects path - arc and downward decent traveled from west to east.  the location of disappearance was east of conrad and north of m12 several hundred yards into the field.  the field has some gently rolling hills and the object could of easily descended below one of these hills and out of her view from the road, giving her the appearance of simply vanishing into the field since it is still completely dark at 5am.  the next evening (roughly 5pm) when further investigating the location in the field, i discovered that the area had just recently (within the last day or two) been disturbed by heavy earth moving equipment. i believe my girlfriend saw what she saw.  i am not sure what to think of someone bulldozing and grating in the location she pointed me too.  - note:  you can not see the earthworks from the roads (neither conrad nor m12) until you are standing at the top of the tallest hill in the field.  i took several videos of the of the earthworks and can provide that to someone at mufon upon request.    note:  not sure what a "crash recovery site" would look like with a small object, but this scenario has crossed my mind.  this was one of the main reasons to submit this report.  this is fresh and you guys might have the equipment to test for things i can not.
content.summary: Observed brilliant basketball sized object appear in sky arcing downward then drop straight down into a farmer's field and vanish

content.detailedDescription:
I am one of those persons who require only 3-4 hours of sleep at night, and usually am up very late at night or very early in the morning ehich is a couple of hours before sunrise.

i am always thirsty and go to the kitchen probably about once an hour for water or to freshen up my tea, and aside for one light in the living room (which is the furthest away spot drom the kitchen sink), only when i read, i have no other lights than the porch light which is on fromdusk until dawn.

my deck where the main entrance is, is on the west side of the house (facing west), and the main door is about in the middle of the western wall of the house.  on the left side of the door, i have a 6 ft long, 5 ft heigh window (mostly covered by blinds in winter) which is in the living room.  i have another window on the right side of the main door which is also the same size as the living room window  (6 ft x 5 ft);  that one is the west facing kitchen window where i have a breakfast nook and that's where i usually sit most of the time until late at night when i go to the living to raise my feet and legs.

i have another window behind the sink which is about 4 feet in height and close to 6 feet in width, and that is on the south wall of the house.  the windows in the kitchen allow me a view close to 180 degrees, and since the breakfast nook seat which i use is about 3 feet from the window and at its center, that spot gives me about a 130-140 degree angle view of the outside (and the deck/porch light is right above the main entrance door outside, illuminating much of the deck and weakening before reaching the southern end of the front, western wall).  i have about 2 acres of lawn area which is mostly west, southwest and south, and is rectangular in shape, covered by a treeline in each direction, and the rest of the land which is close to 50 acres is heavily wooded. 

last night i was reading in the living room, and around 03:30 am, i went to the kitchen to make some tea.  as soon as i got to the sink, i turned the water on to fill the percolator, and while waiting, i looked straight out to see if there were any wild animals and whether there were any stars as there were no clouds that night.

i noticed a light on the sw side, barely above the treeline (it wasn't right above the treeline and seemed probably at least 4-5 miles away, the treeline only helping as a reference in determining the angle of the light source).  first i thought it was one of the few stars that are large enough to clearly see with the naked eye and that appear to blink.  however when my eyes focused better on it, i realized it was probably a good 10, maybe 15 times the size of the largest star.  i checked the time on the oven to the left of the sink, and it was 03:32 am.  i put the percolator aside and went straight to the breakfast nook to get my binoculars (i keep them there to better see birds that are attracted by the multiple feeders i have.  i did not have any lights on in the kitchen btw as the downstairs of the house has an open floor plan with no walls, and even though the entrance to the kitchen has a closet on one side and the stairs/basement door on the other, it still has about a 7 foot wide opening which still allows the reading light i had on to produce enough light for me to see where i am walking without turning on the kitchen lights (and there is the porch light that also gives enough light through the western window).

when i found the binoculars and was back at the sink, it was 3:36 am and the light was still at the same exact spot as where i had first seen it.

there seemed to be 4 lights which kept pulsating but then, they would blink up one or two at a time, and the colors would be different, and those changed from regular light white to yellow, red, green and blue, systematically coming on one oe two at a time clockwise starting with the top right (when 2 at a time, the rop and bottom right first and then rhe left 2), and none of them would go out until the 4th light came on, and then they would all go out (only out for a fraction of a second and maybe faster than 1/10 of a second).

i'm still trying to move in to my house which i purchased the last day of february last year, and still have no clue as to where my cameras are;  my phone takes really good pictures so i actually never tried to specifically look for my other cameras.

by the time i got to the living room and back, the oven clock indicated it was 03:43 am.

however it turned out that the phone camera is really not good with small sources of light at night time as it would most times just catch the exact time frame when the lights were out, so it would show only a black sky.  yet, i still managed to get a few shots even though the camera had a very hard time focusing on a tiny spot in the horizon.

i also tried filming, and even though that seemed to have worked better than taking shots, i had weird grainy noise that kind of interfered with a smooth picture.  it was instant noise as i hit the record button, and not something that showed only when i played back the recording.   basically i had little white dots coming on and off constantly all over the screen as if i were getting electromagnetic interference  (the light source was quite far away, and i can't see how that would be responsible for the noise).

i ran back to the living room and grabbed  my tablet to see if that would record it any better but by the time i got back, the light was gone. the oven clock showed 03:51 am.

i stayed there until 4:05am and then continued reading my book in the kitchen.  i checked probably 5-6 times an hour until the sun rose but didn't see the light again.

i also have no cell phone reception where i live and no phone companies that can install a landline.  even satellite internet isn't available but i have a very weak wireless adsl connection for the internet and have access to my email at all times even though i can only use a cell phone only when i am in bangor.
content.summary: Stationary object with pulsating lights in the horizon not moving for at least 19 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place 18 years ago and i dont know the date, or the season nor did i note the time, but nevertheless everything else burnt itself into my memory. at the time i was a teenager living in a small village surrounded by large fields.
from my bedroom window to my right i could overlook a large part of our neighbours yard. closest to me was a hedge, then the dog kennel and then came the driveway and the neighbour's house.
all in all i would estimate a linear distance of 40m from my window to the house of the neighbours. 
our neighbours had a dog which was allowed to run free on the property at night.
on the outer wall of their house facing me was a light with motion sensor which, when switched on, was rather bright and illuminated a good part of their yard.
it was very common to me to see sae the light funnel on my wall of my bedroom.
this motion light which lasted for a couple of seconds would go off when  the dog walking about.
on one night, i was lying in my bed not sleeping. i think it must have been after midnight because everbody was already asleep
apart from me and was worried as it was school next day. 
as i lay looking around my room i saw the neightbours motion sensor light go off.
after a good few moments i wondered why the motion light would not switch off again and i thought maybe the dog keeps moving in front of it causing it to trigger constantly.
i got up and looked out my window to check.
in the middle of the yard stood a very bright object. 
i didn't really understand what i was watching there but i felt curious. 
i would describe it as follows:
a round /perhaps saucer shaped object with a diameter of approx. 3 to 4 meter shining extremely bright allover.
around its rim were different coloured lights blinking (green,red,orange, yellow)
due to the brightness i cannot estimate the height.
it was hard to recognise anything around it just like the area around the object was faded out by the light that it produced.
still it was not hurtful to look right into it.
i opened the window slightly and listened for any sounds, there were none.
i could see that the motion sensor light on the wall of the house was still on.
i tired very hard but could not detect any movements whatsoever.
i would have expected to see or hear the dog somewhere but there was nothing.
i watched it for roughly 20 to 30 minutes. nothing else happened apart from the object being "parked" there.
after a while, all lights went off. suddenly it became pitch black.
i stared at the point where the object was but i could'nt make out anything also the motion sensor light was off.
my eyes needed to adjust for a moment due to the sudden darkness.
it was just gone. i even scanned the sky but there too, i couldn't see anything.
i stood at my window for another few minutes but then decided to go to bed.

the next day i also went to the neighbours and showed them where i saw the object. to my best knowledge i cannot say that there as anything unusual to the grass and driveway. they laughed at me....
on the picture you see the arrow is pointing to my window and the star is the position of the ufo.
content.summary: Large and bright object observed in neighbour's garden

content.detailedDescription: While i was traveling through plymouth n.C on jan. 2nd 2016 i looked up and noticed a white object in the sky just north of me, the sky was extremely clear, very blue sky except for this one object.It expected it to be a plane but it never moved and had no con trail, so i assumed it to be a meteor, but it still hadnt moved, after about 5 mins of watching this object i pulled over in a motel parking lot and took one snapshot on my galaxy 5 smartphone. in the image, the object is to the right and halfway up the communications tower in the picture. i watched the object for another minute after taking picture before getting back on the road out of plymouth heading north, i observed the object for another 30 secs to one minute before i realized the object was no longer in the sky. after thinking about what i could of saw, i believe the shape and position of the object best answer to what i saw was perhaps it was the underside of the black knight in a low earth orbit. being white underneath makes sense if "they" want to be hard to see. i hope you all can use your equipment to blow up my picture and get a more clear view of this object.Please alert me if you get a decent image from my picture, id love to know what this was! thank you for your time!
content.summary: Possible sighting of black knight, but was white underneath!

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back to my apartment with my boyfriend from a movie at 2:20am and i looked up at the sky ahead and saw a green light that looked like a bigger star. the light was hovering high in the sky and then started moving erratically from right to left. it then shot up in the sky and hovered again but this time started blinking rapidly for a couple seconds and then would stop. the light then would disappear only for a moment and started glowing green again. my boyfriend also witnessed the light and could not explain what it was. i then saw it rapidly descend below the trees and houses. i stayed outside for a few more minutes to see if anything came back but nothing happened after that.
content.summary: Green light hovered , blinked, took off fast left and right  and shot up  then glowed and dropped rapidly

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was home, it was 4:50 am january 5th and i was up because i couldn't sleep that night. we live in a rural farming area and the sky was clear for all sightings with only minimal clouds passing. stars easily visible. i had been just working on my pc when i got up to get a glass of water. there is a large window at my kitchen sink and there was a very bright light  off in the distance. it just caught my eye. the object at first was just above the tree line and was moving toward my direction when it suddenly turned left went a short distance then turned back to the right. the light from it was much brighter now and it became obvious this was an extremely large object and not behaving like an airplane. it continued on the tree line just a short distance and then began to slowly but distinctly ascend at an angle moving s, se. i called to my daughter to see too, she was quite moved that it was not a natural thing as well. as we observed it for at least 30 to 40 mins,i tried to capture both photos and video of the goings on. although my cell phone does not take the best photos , i still clicked away. as we watched the object settled in a spot at least 50 to 60 thousand feet maybe more.  but then more objects became visible ( all in- it became 7 other objects with the biggest one, they created a formation that i can draw) and approached the larger object. the larger object maintained a very bright white light that would seem to be blue or green  or reddish at times. sometimes you could distinguish it seemed to be rotating. its light would flash and glow. most notable was a fairly large, very bright red object which seemed to just appear just near the larger bright light and began to move away going say 300 ft above the treeline, moving in an e, ne direction. this object moved quite quickly and was a extremely deep bright red. much larger than any airplane or helicopter would be. there was no noise to speak of from the objects but. there were three distinguishable airplanes that passed across the sky during the sighting and as is usual we were able to hear two of them and are positive they were airplanes. one seemed to pass right near it. maybe difference in altitude but definitely within each others airspace. i've been able to capture video from this sighting but it is actually the very best video from december 19 that takes the cake. i have named the files with the corresponding dates of capture.(i'm not great at the date time thing jus sayin, i'm learning).*please note, it was very cold outside,i am shivering. i did my best to steady the camera but it is a little shaky. in the video it is distinctly changing shape and forming three orb-like parts and then reconstituting back to one object. very colorful and looking as if it is spinning with your naked eye. so i have much in video and pictures of several different sightings , all occurring right in my back yard over the last several weeks/months. as you can see from the file dates i am including tonights video as again it is right there almost the same spot. but, the jan 5th sighting was so blatantly odd and basically in my face it motivated me to finally contact you at mufon.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the predawn of january 5th was the most profound sighting of the many that have been occurring over the last several weeks. this night it was a much larger craft and several smaller ones. i watch them from my back porch. i have many photos and video..

content.detailedDescription:
January 2, 2016 approx. 4 p.M.(p s t) clear skies. approx. 30 deg f
my wife spots what appeared to be a low flying jet with no contrails,no wings, and no tail,and no lights. it was reflecting the sunlight w/blue sky background. visibility was great. no sound as it hovered (approx. 1,000 ft)n  . east of alpowa summit (2,785 ft) pointing toward clarkston, wa. as we we're driving east on highway 12, i glanced up to see the craft and confirm her sighting. we proceeded to the summit for a better view about 2 minutes up the hill. the craft had disappeared from a 360 degree view w/50 mile visibility. we noticed another car had stopped on a perpendicular road. we flashed our lights but we're not able to compare notes, so we don't know if they saw the cigar. although brief it was another u f o. to the best of our knowledge there are no 737 style jets landing at any of the small nearby airports. keep your head up.
content.summary: Cigar shaped reflective, no wings,no tail, approx.1,000 feet above the terrain. no contrails .Temp approx 30 disappears suddenly

content.detailedDescription: The 4 solid white lights were in between my location and the mountains. appearing stationary for 2-3 minutes. then rapidly heading se (unconventional) while maintaining their shape. i understand there are air force bases close to this location but this was unlike any military aircraft i have ever seen before. immediately after witnessing the event my eyes, nose and mouth started watering uncontrollably. (probably due to realizing that i had just witnessed a ufo). i remember the event like it was yesterday.
content.summary: 4 solid white lights in a perfect square.

content.detailedDescription:
The first sighting occurred on 1/6/16. i live on the top floor of an apartment. while watching tv in the living room, i saw a light outside of my balcony around 2000/2030. thinking it was a helicopter or plane, i ignored it. the light appeared to be getting brighter and changing in characteristic. i got up and observed two bright white objects with red lights. the second object disappeared and there was only one object. the object was hovering but was making small adjustments in its position. it was not completely stationary. it would stay illuminated for several minutes then it would fade away. after several more moments, the object would re-appear. this occurred for roughly 2 hours staying in the relatively same position. around 2200, a helicopter flew from the east to south in the direction of the object which then disappeared for the rest of the night (at least until midnight). there is a military base east of my location. i am not familiar with the differences between a military or civilian helicopter so i am not sure if it was from the military base.

on 1/7/16, the object again appeared in the same position as the night before. the time it was sighted was from 2000 - 2130. you can see planes, stars, and helicopters in the area which all look different from the object. the object was brighter on 1/7 but may have been closer in proximity. the object was spherical in nature and you could see a clear row of lights that had both red and white lights. the object again would be illuminated for several moments then fade away completely. no helicopters were observed flying toward the object this evening.
content.summary: Pulsating object with row of lights that would fade then re-appear.

on 1/7/16, the object again appeared in the same position as the night before. the time it was sighted was from 2000 - 2130. you can see planes, stars, and helicopters in the area which all look different from the object. the object was brighter on 1/7 but may have been closer in proximity. the object was spherical in nature and you could see a clear row of lights that had both red and white lights. the object again would be illuminated for several moments then fade away completely. no helicopters were observed flying toward the object this evening.
content.summary: Pulsating object with row of lights that would fade then re-appear.
